message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and it's a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $9,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000, but that's the best I can do. I'm really interested in the product, so I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
